snippet.title: How Much MONEY We Spent on Our Indie Game SCHROTT!
snippet.description:
⚙️ Wishlist SCHROTT: https://s.team/a/2427070
In this Devlog Linus will show you everything you need to know about our indie game SCHROTT and our company Ivy Juice Games. We want to be as transparent as possible. :) Linus will talk about all the current numbers of our game like Followers, Wishlists, Features and the Money spent on the game. If you are interested in a specific topic, let us know! 

🧃 IVY JUICE GAMES 🧃
🖥️ Website: https://ivyjuice.games/
🎮 Discord: https://discord.gg/jDsBUV2ens
🖼️ Instagram: https://instagram.com/ivyjuicegames/
🐦 X: https://twitter.com/ivyjuicegames
📱 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@ivyjuicegames
👓 LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/91589987

🔊 MUSIC & SFX 🔊
 @audiocreatures_official 

📢 BIG THANKS 📢
@DEHIVE @Medienboard @spielfabrique9862 @StiftungDigitaleSpielekultur 

👻 CHAPTERS 👻
0:00 Intro
0:09 Who we are
0:25 Features
0:36 The Team
1:00 How many Followers do we have?
2:09 How much Money did we spend?
2:31 How many Wishlists do we have?
2:44 Important Information
3:02 Outro

#devlog #team #money #funding #production #gamedevelopment #indie #success #games #indiegame #indiestudio #cargame #schrott #gamedeveloper #roguelite #drivinggames
